CatRefreshTlv Struct Reference

structure used to store all Refresh Event parameters. More...

#include <qaCbkCatEventReportInd.h>

Data Fields

USHORT RefreshMode
BYTE RefreshStage

Detailed Description

Parameters:
RefreshMode - The Refresh Event as in ETSI TS 102 223 [Section 8.6]
RefreshStage - Stage of a refresh procedure

  • 0x01 – Refresh start
  • 0x02 – Refresh success
  • 0x03 – Refresh failed
